title: The Shepherd and the Witch

source_text.text:
A poor shepherd shelters at a witch’s house and sees her daughter enslaved. The daughter urges him to flee with her before her mother eats him. She hands him a needle, a lump of salt, and a waterskin.
They slip away at dawn. The witch wakes and pursues. The shepherd throws the needle, which becomes a thorn forest; the salt, which rises into a craggy mountain; the water, which swells into a deep river the witch cannot cross.
The witch howls and turns back. The shepherd brings the daughter home; she is freed from witchcraft, and they marry with the village’s blessing.

source_text_persian.text: چوپان در خانهٔ جادوگر گیر می‌افتد و دختر اسیر او را نجات می‌دهد. دختر به او سوزن، نمک و مشک آب می‌دهد تا در فرار بیندازد. سوزن خارستان، نمک کوه و آب رود می‌شود و جادوگر جا می‌ماند. آن دو به روستا برمی‌گردند و عروسی می‌کنند.
